articles.title: In democracy's birthplace, Pope Francis warns of populist threats - CTV News
articles.description: Pope Francis warned Saturday that the 'easy answers' of populism and authoritarianism threaten democracy in Europe and called for fresh dedication to promoting the common good.
articles.content:
